div.h1: Welcome to Conifer View Guest House
div.p: Experience authentic Kashmiri hospitality in the heart of Tangmarg, your gateway to the breathtaking beauty of Gulmarg. Surrounded by snow-capped peaks and pine forests, our cozy mountain homestay offers the perfect base for your Kashmir adventure.
Stunning views of pine-clad slopes and Kashmir valley
Complimentary on-site parking for all guests
Stay connected with high-speed internet access
Just 11-14 km from Gulmarg ski resort

Conifer View Guest House is a family-run homestay nestled in the peaceful town of Tangmarg, the gateway to Gulmarg. Our traditional Kashmiri house offers warm hospitality, clean comfortable rooms, and stunning views of the surrounding mountains.

Located just 11-14 kilometers from Gulmarg, we provide the perfect balance of tranquility and accessibility to Kashmir's premier ski destination. Whether you're here for adventure sports, sightseeing, or simply to unwind in nature's embrace, our guest house offers the ideal retreat.

img.alt: Conifer View Guest House exterior view

div.p: Choose from our well-appointed rooms, each designed with your comfort in mind and featuring modern amenities alongside traditional Kashmiri charm.
Cozy room with one king bed, perfect for couples seeking comfort and mountain views.
Flexible accommodation with options for twin beds or one king bed, ideal for friends or couples.
Spacious room with multiple beds, perfect for families visiting the beautiful Kashmir valley.
